name: New Arcade - Week 4 - Animation
description:
Press "A" to play the animation.

An early version of the attract screen for my midterm game. Features models made by me in Blender, some sound effects generated with Bfxr, and a space photo from NASA/the ESA.

Also using Daniel Wilches' Ardity in the background.

https://www.bfxr.net/

https://ardity.dwilches.com/

https://www.nasa.gov/image-feature/the-sparkle-of-distant-galaxies
